results.summary: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi will release the 15th Instalment of PM KISAN Scheme from Birsa College, Khunti, Jharkhand on 15th November which is celebrated as ‘Janjatiya Gaurav Diwas’ (Tribal Pride Day).

results.summary: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi helps Haryana Farmer.
PM inaugurates PM Kisan Samman Sammelan 2022, releases PM-KISAN Funds worth Rs 16,000 crore.
PM KISAN, a game changer DBT Scheme.
Prime Minister Shri Modi transfers Rs. 16,800 crore towards PM Kisan Samman Nidhi.

results.summary: Revised Guidelines of PMKSY Per Drop More Crop (Micro Irrigation)
Operationalisation of PMKSY – Micro Irrigation Fund (MIF)
Revised MoA and ToR of Operational Guidelines of Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) – Micro Irrigation Fund (MIF)
Annual allocation of Central Share for implementation of Per Drop More Crop component of Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY-PDMC) during FY 2020-21

Utilisation of unspent funds out of grant-in-aid released in previous financial year (2020-21)
                        for implementation of Per Drop More Crop component of Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY-PDMC) during FY 2021-22 - Revalidation regarding
Proceedings of Webinar on “Use of Micro-irrigation for Enhanced Water Use Efficiency” held on Date: 17.8.2020 at 4.30 P.M, Krishi Bhawan, New Delhi
Operational Guidelines of Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) – Micro Irrigation Fund (MIF)
Common Format for One Touch Information on PMKSY
Brief of Status of Micro-Irrigation Fund (MIF) created under NABARD
